text:
Data #COVID19 mortality #T2Diabetes population

Based on HR, ⬆️risk with:

Age (esp. >70) (Strongest determinant)
Deprivation
Ethnicity
Control (esp. A1c>75)
Duration >10 years
BMI (>40)
Prev. Stroke, HF
⬇️ eGFR (esp. <45)

#StayAtHome
Take the #Vaccine when offered

#gbdoc https://t.co/5W8SLf4JjL
